en-US.title: 2468 Scorekeeper (Lite)
en-US.subtitle: Advanced Poker Scoring Made Simple
en-US.description: The ultimate scoring app for 2-4-6-8 poker games. Features dual hand mode for split pots, multiplier support, round-by-round tracking, and intuitive landscape/portrait layouts. Perfect for home games and tournaments with automatic doubling rules and comprehensive score history.
